Group B ; 15 Patients previously diagnose OLP present acute exacerbation treat topical corticosteroid ; Triamcinolone acetonide ( Kenalog orabase : Bristol-Myers , Squibb , Spain ) apply topically 4 time day i.e . follow meal bed time one month .
